website_summaries.verdict: This simple stool will easily blend in with any kitchen and is durable enough to hold up to many years of use.
pros: Swivel top with comfortable faux leather cushion
Quality craftsmanship that will hold up well over time
cons: Assembly is straightforward, but takes about 30 minutes per stool

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy for a Mid-Century or Modern Decor
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE STOOLS! I ordered a similar product from Overstock and they came in defective. Alas, I should have stuck with Amazon in the first place. I bought two and loved them so much I bought a third! I recently redecorated my entire apartment (with custom furniture) and these little stools get more compliments than anything else! Very sturdy, easy to assemble and best of all...they're comfortable to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Riley McMuscle

customer_reviews.title: Would like it replaced
customer_reviews.text: We ordered three stools. One stool broke on the top of the stool in the cross wood section underneath the seat pad. Do not believe it can be repaired. There are only two of us in our home so not high usage. Both of us are senior adults of standard weight. Would like it replaced. The other two stools are fine at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Jolyn Karren

customer_reviews.title: I decided to exchange the bad one and to my surprise the replacement also is ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 stools and one came damaged. They also did not match in color and were off slightly in height. I decided to exchange the bad one and to my surprise the replacement also is damaged. I will give them one more chance to get it right. Hopefully 3rd time is a charm! While the majority of the reviews have been really good, so far this has been a very disappointing purchase for me. Will update again when I get the second replacement. Please let it be a good one!!!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Beutiful, well made stools!
customer_reviews.text: We purchase 1 of these stools to check it out. When we received the first one, I noticed that it was made in Vietnam. I was totally impressed with the quality of these stools, so we ordered 5 more. As a mechanical engineer, I am always critical of how thing "go together". The assembly and fit of these stools was very high quality! All of the screws went in smoothly, and there were no missing parts! The stools are very comfortable to sit on, as they have nicely padded tops. I would have given them a "10 star" rating if it was available. Thanks for making a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jody W.

customer_reviews.title: update.  both have already broken.
customer_reviews.text: These stools are great. They are solid wood and very sturdy. Beautiful walnut color. I was looking for months for a somewhat midcentury style barstool and these fit perfect. They are extremly easy to put together and packaged well. There were no marks, scuffs, misising pieces,or any type of defect on the wood.. Update. Both have already broken. The foot steps fall off making the chair unstable. We use these stools daily but not for long periods of time. The base under the seat has completely broken in half making it unsuitable to sit in. Very disappointed as I took a long time researching. Going to do metal now thanks
customer_reviews.author: demac

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Great size. Good value for the money. Love the metal protection for the foot rest. Love there are protective numbers on the bottom of the legs to prevent damaging your floors. Packaged really well. No damage. A couple of negatives (minor) —the swivel is too tight, meaning that you have to “turn” the stool seat around manually after you stand up. I find I spend a lot of time adjusting them back to their original position. And, the finish is pretty shiny. More than I’d like, but that’s a personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: dkfromTN

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT counter-height stool, GREAT solid quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how much my family and I absolutely LOVE these stools!!!! AMAZING quality! Very heavy-duty wood and the leather seat is extremely comfy. Swivels smooth and with ease, although not too much. Did I mention the quality is AMAZING? Seriously you won't regret purchasing this piece! SUPER easy to install and had zero missing pieces... all holes lined up perfect... just a great piece of furniture. I've been told they look like they came out of a high-end bar! I'm a short and petite gal and my hubby is a solid 6'4" burly man and they seem to fit us both perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stools!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these stools to avoid a very pricy alternative (that looked almost exactly the same), and I love them. I read other reviews, so I was prepared for the larger seat base on top. It is so, so comfortable. Like another reviewer, I also turned the foot rail upside down, when putting together to show the wood instead of the black metal strip, and it looks fabulous and has held up well. I would buy these again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Riebs

customer_reviews.title: Look all parts over before assembling
customer_reviews.text: The seat is very firm. Actually they’re uncomfortable. They do look nice and I’m hoping once they’re broken In they’ll be more comfortable to sit on. One leg on one of the three stools had a missing locking nut. We didn’t notice until we went to tighten all the bolts. Amazon said to send it back but that meant disassembling it and trying to repack it so it fit in the box. I also didn’t want to lug it to UPS. We’re going to the hardware store to see if they have a part to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: rplpal

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, sturdy wood, but a crossbar on one stool came off
customer_reviews.text: Nice price. Stools look really good. It took me over an hour to put together each of my 3 stools but I'm not a DIY'er. The directions were clear and easy to follow. Just, for me, time consuming. For overall look and quality, I would have given a higher rating, but a crossbar on the legs of a stool broke off resulting in a little splintered wood. I was able to get the crossbar back on, and maybe the problem was my assembly, but...
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Amazingly Beautiful and Well Designed!
customer_reviews.text: These stools are such great quality. They arrived beautifully packaged. We are so happy with these stools. They are sturdy, functional, and beautiful. We had a house fire and lost most everything. It was such a joy for some of our first replacement items to be better than expected. We will recommend these stills to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mmccartney

customer_reviews.title: Looks and Feels like Fine Furniture
customer_reviews.text: Great quality...! Beautifully finished ultra smooth wood legs, true to color, good quality weight, stable, easy to assemble... Very well packed: it took awhile to remove all packaging and even more time to prepare all of the assembly hardware which was also beautifully wrapped... I believe the seat cover is faux leather and I would like silver nail head trim instead of the "real brass"...
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: We've had these barstools for about 6 months and are completely satisfied. We find them comfortable and use them every day since we have them at our kitchen counter. Everything works great and we've gotten compliments on them. No issues with damage, breakage or comfort. I definitely recommend them and my hubby assembled them easily (we are NOT furniture assembly people) since the directions are very good.
customer_reviews.author: MC in San Dieg

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something different and I wanted all wood. I looked for a long time and finally saw these. I had no idea if they would be comfortable. But when they arrived, not only were they absolutely beautiful, but they are well-made, very sturdy and absolutely stunning. A Great Buy. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Cardinal

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: These are a beautiful 2 toned wood tone that pairs well with both dark and warm wood furniture. They’re sturdy and slide under the bar easily so that I can maintain a clear walk space. Sometimes I forget that I’ve got them because they’re never on the way. It’s nice to sit at bar again.
customer_reviews.author: OH

customer_reviews.title: Boraam Stools Unsatisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the fact that the original shipment incorrectly included two different wood finishes, I expected a flawless product considering the cost of the stools. My primary point of dissatisfaction is that the top of the legs split as a result of contact with the swivel mechanism under the weight of a seated person. Also experienced difficulty during assembly due to misalignment of pre-set anchors with bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Leo J McDermott Jr

customer_reviews.title: Real wood
customer_reviews.text: Solid wood. A couple of bolts were not drilled correctly. This resulted in not using the washer and being very careful tightening them up. I bought 2 stools and one on each stool was defective like this. Other than that, sturdy and very comfortable. For $89 it was a fantastic deal. I have two friends that are going to order 4 after seeing ours and sitting in them.
customer_reviews.author: Happiness is a choice

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but don't sit on them if you want them to stay that way.
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed. They are beautiful right out of the box, and they even look high quality at first, but within a few months (used daily as breakfast bar stools) the top material was cracking. Now they look horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C. O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Like: these are beautiful stools that are just what I was looking for. I love the look and the finish. Dislike: the legs were uneven on 2 of the 3 stools (nothing that a silicone bumper and gorilla glue didn't fix though) They seem sturdy. I am a plus size woman and they hold my weight with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately lack of quality.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered April 30th 2014, the "Bonded leather" seat cover is already flaking and braking and peeling off. I'll be attempting a replacement through Amazon, as the stool is very nice looking however, if the entire padding is showing, not so much. Four Stools all the same condition. I'll try to upload a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Zicari

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking stool
customer_reviews.text: Look very nice but they were a little tricky to put together. One of mine was missing the female joint the cross bar screws into. Didn’t notice and when I contacted the company it had been over 30 days so the wouldn’t honor the warranty. Had to glue it in. Hope it holds!
customer_reviews.author: PegO

customer_reviews.title: These stools are awesome and VERY sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These stools are awesome and VERY sturdy. The larger diameter makes it perfect for, shall we say, larger rumps. Lol. These are not small, cheap bar stools. The color is awesome. The seat is cream color not grey. I love them. Not hard to put together. Does take about 15-20 minutes each. I purchased five. No regrets. Friends and family compliment them all the time. Ten stars. Those who comment negatively about the size should have researched them prior to purchase. I knew the size prior to placing in my cart and purchasing. A lack of research should not cause a negative remark in these stools. As I stated, ten stars is my rating.
customer_reviews.author: David W Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Boraam 29 inch bar stool
customer_reviews.text: Overall the 29 inch stools are easy to assemble and look great for the price. The materials are well constructed and the seats are comfortable. They rotate easily and look good in cherry. My only issue is the wood supports under the stool seat can crack depending on the individual sitting on them and difficult to get parts. Also if they are moved they may scratch wood floors. Both my reasons for 4 stars. Overall I like them and would recommend for use.
customer_reviews.author: VinceNaples

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend purchasing these stools
customer_reviews.text: I received these stools in April, 2014. It is not December, 2014 and the "leather" fabric is ripping off just below the brass nails. This is similar to another report about these stools. Amazon will not allow a replacement; I must contact the manufacturer directly. I would not recommend purchasing these stools. I believe something should last longer than eight months. These are attractive stools and appear sturdy, but the fact that all four stools are experiencing the same defect says otherwise. Don't purchase these.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Screws Loose
customer_reviews.text: Screws Loose I found the stool to be very comfortable, but I don't sit in it for long, just while I'm cooking; I wish it came in a blond/tan color to match my cabinets. My major complaint is that the screws keep coming loose. Two in the seat dropped out twice. The second time, the screws in the legs had loosened so much that it was about to fall apart. It says Made in Vietnam, but the "fiberboard" materials come from Thailand.
customer_reviews.author: P. Girard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Good stools that are fairly easy to assemble. The cushion is a bit hard to start with, but softens up after some use. The stools are a bit wider than they appear on the website. I had one issue that was cleared up right away with quick and friendly customer service.
customer_reviews.author: JudyGG

customer_reviews.title: Received broken piece
customer_reviews.text: These are great especially for the price! Only downside is that one of them came broken. I’ve sent two emails to the manufacturer for a replacement piece and have not received any sort of response. I was still able to assemble with the broken piece, but a big chunk is missing from the foot rest!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, Safety, Beauty
customer_reviews.text: Our old kitchen stools were falling apart and so dangerous...when I saw this stool, I was stoked. So sturdy and comfortable plus easy to slide where you need it. The design matches our decor and I will be purchasing more for our new home soon.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: If you want a stool with terrible quality in every way then buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk and a waste of money. The piece that attaches to the seat was cracked in two places. I put it together anyway and when I set it on the floor it wobbles meaning the legs do not all fit the same. A piece of crap. Do not buy. I would not recommend to anybody. I wish I would have bought the one at Wayfair for twice the price but the quality would have been better I am sure.
customer_reviews.author: Bob F.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer.
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools are super cute and appear well made. One had a small knick on the leg, despite being packaged well, but it's not too noticeable so I kept it. I wish they came in espresso, but the cappuccino color works ok. Very easy to assemble. One thing to note, do NOT remove the arrow sticky until you screw in the spools (not sure if that's the correct word) or you're very clear which direction they should go. Also, make sure they're loose, add the swivel, and THEN tighten the spools a bit more. I put the 2nd stool together in less than 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: RareEssence

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I took up playing the flute back in the 70s when I was a big Jethro Tull fan. I was never any good but enjoyed it nonetheless. I now live in a modest one-bedroom apartment and my flute stuff is crowded into a small corner. This stool takes up minimal space, is extremely comfortable and I can sit down and swivel into the correct position relative to the music stand in no time at all. Plus it matches the rest of the furniture very well.
customer_reviews.author: JoeMcD

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Much as described
customer_reviews.text: Bought five of these chairs. They came in three different shipments and needed to be put together. They come with the allen wrench needed to put them together. I used lock-tite to help prevent the screws from coming loose over the year.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

customer_reviews.title: Cherry doesn't match previous purchased stools
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 4 of the Boraam Backless Swivel Stools, counter height, about 3 years ago, to use at our kitchen island.. We really should have purchased 6 so I decided to buy 2 more. Waited a long time for these to be back in stock, bought 2 of the exact same stools as before, but the new stools aren't the same color. Box ready "Cherry" but the stools are a lot lighter than the previously purchased stools. So if you buys these, make sure you buy enough the first time around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price I think it would be hard to beat these stools.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I think it would be hard to beat these stools. They look great, they're sturdy (I do have to tighten the hex screws every now and again, so keep you supplied Allen wrench handy). These stools are used every day and have held up well for just about a year. Assembly was easy. We have two, and they fit our need and our budget perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: N. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Double check the hardware kit.
customer_reviews.text: Stools are sturdy and well made. Watch the screw lengths! I had 1 screw that was an inch longer than the rest and it started splitting the wood as i tried tightening it. I realized this before causing further damage and cut the screw down. Also, don't over tighten the screws or the split washers will deform and pop off. Use small metal washers under the nailed in leg protectors to level the stools.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but questionable workmanship
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 3 stools in June 2015. They are very comfortable, attractive, and functional. In mid 2017 one of them had a leg break where the cross brace connects. It's made me leary about buying a replacement. UPDATE: 2 of the 3 chairs are now broken. Both broke at the cross brace / foot rest area.
customer_reviews.author: pbjorn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these stools for our newly remodeled kitchen counter top. My husband put them together quickly and easily. They are very sturdy and comfortable to sit on. The leather seats are nice and the foot rest has a protective plate around it so no scratching and scuffing. I just wish they also made these with a back so I could have matching chairs for my counter height dining table.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I placed an order for 7 of these. All ...
customer_reviews.text: I placed an order for 7 of these. All of them came from different lots. Colors didn't match, wood grain didnt match, and even the heights were slightly off by about an inch or 2! After receiving replacement after replacement, I gave up on trying to get them to all match.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B

customer_reviews.title: These match my custom built table perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs were easy to assemble, sturdy, and well packaged. I am extremely pleased with this purchase and would buy these again. Tall chairs are not easily accessible or moveable when seated. With the swivel seats, one can move the chair close to the table and then swivel your legs under the table. The contour seat is very comfortable and the price is exceptional for the quality of product.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Lives

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but a little too bulky for may small kitchen area.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two stools. However, when I put the second one together, the one leg isn't fitting with the top of the seat. One screw barely makes it in the other hole while the other doesn't even match with it. I am not sure how to fix this. I don't even know how to return this or get a leg that actually fits it correctly. This is the only problem that is keeping it at 3 stars. Other than that, it would be 5 stars. How do I get a leg that fits without having to return the entire stool? Beautiful but a little too bulky for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one and loved it, then it was sold out everywhere for months. Finally completed my set of 4 but had to buy from Home Depot because amazon was sold out for a while. So inexpensive and pretty nice quality. I’ve had them for 4 months and no issues. My husband put them together with no issues but he’s very handy. Attached is a pic of them in a kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Updated! (Dead in 3 months)
customer_reviews.text: Dead in 3 months. The seat no longer swivels and the finish is gone from the foot rails. Waste of money. ***The bolts under the seat were what was stopping the seat from swiveling properly. Tightened them back up and I'm back in business.***
customer_reviews.author: Ms Julia

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Great Add to My Studio
customer_reviews.text: Bought this stool for my music studio and it fit the bill perfectly! Comfortable and the foot rail height is perfect for my positioning my right leg to rest my guitar when playing. I don't write many reviews, but had to on this one. Super excellent piece of furniture for the money. Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Surf Monster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We have received many compliments on the stools that we purchased. Very solid construction and the appearance has exceeded our expectations. The color matches our island counter perfectly. I have read that some people had trouble assembling these items? Why? It's not a 747! Just follow the instructions. Buy them, you'll love them!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Long

customer_reviews.title: Okay stool
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy stool and easy to put together. However, I was not pleased with the dull bonded leather seat. It did not match the seats of my other Boraam bar stools which had more of a sheen to them.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Rose

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions are wrong--spindles shouldn’t twist on in different directions depending on which side of the stool they are on. As a result, the spindles keep falling out and we have to avoid putting any weight on them. The seat itself is heavy material, but the legs are lightweight and therefore the stools move around too easily and feel cheap. Foot rests are covered in a sticky clear plastic material that leaves excessive sticky residue when removed but look cheap when left on.
customer_reviews.author: JANE Y CHUN

customer_reviews.title: Missed the mark
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to match 3 that we already had. The finish on this is actually darker than pictured and larger diameter than the one's we had. Unfortunately, it's enough different that it doesn't blend in with the others. Well constructed though, a complete set of these would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Randman

customer_reviews.title: it will sometimes make a popping sound like the ball bearings may break
customer_reviews.text: Ordered three. Didn't notice until several days after I put them together that one of the three is painted black at the lower edge of the seat. If you sit towards the edge of the cushion, it will sometimes make a popping sound like the ball bearings may break. I only weigh 165. Not worth returning since I already put it together and got rid of the box. Otherwise they seem okay. pretty solid for the price. Will see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: Chewbacca

customer_reviews.title: that being said the stools are very comfortable and look good
customer_reviews.text: one of the stools came in broken and I had to repair , because I work with wood and have the tools after about an hour got it repaired. that being said the stools are very comfortable and look good, nice design.
customer_reviews.author: marty garston

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, fall apart.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these stool, but they are cheaply made and fall apart. I purchased three stool one year ago, and two have completely broken. The parts are not aligned and the spindles do not fit into the holes. As much as I love the look of these stool, I can't recommend this stool, and would advise not to waste your money. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: E. Fabry

customer_reviews.title: Nice stools. Not the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Do far so good. Wasn’t sure they were going together properly but after some patience they seem quite nice. Update- Not very comfortable for longish periods.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love these stools. Sturdy, easy to assemble and absolutely beautiful - not to mention totally affordable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stools, assembly instructions not 100% clear
customer_reviews.text: These stools are excellent for the price: solid construction, easy to put together, and great looking. The only word of caution is for during the initial setup: The instructions say to mount the legs to the seat, and then mount the footrest ring. I found that if you actually tightened the legs down, it's almost impossible to get that ring to fit in the slots of the legs. Instead, I put the legs on loosely, then mounted the ring loosely, then tightened everything down. By the fourth stool, I was able to put everything together in about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Barend

customer_reviews.title: Love the look!
customer_reviews.text: Great stools. Easy to put together. They swivel well and are quite sturdy. The seat is a bit hard, but I'm hoping that will soften up in time. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: alf

customer_reviews.title: We bought 2 and love them. Specifically because they take up less space ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 and love them. Specifically because they take up less space and can fit under the counter when not used. Look great and comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the value
customer_reviews.text: Solid wood; Easy to install Not 5 stars because one came with a striped, but easy to fix I read the comments before buying and decided to try ... in my case, I received a good product, someone wrote that the base of the seat was plastic but mine came in steel / Maybe Amazon offers the same product from different sources / I guess that I'm one of the lucky ones!
customer_reviews.author: JOSEGIO

customer_reviews.title: I've seen these chairs go for twice the asking price of Amazon and I don't see how you could get a better chair.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my daughter and have to tell you that the quality of this chair is outstanding along with the price. I've seen these chairs go for twice the asking price of Amazon and I don't see how you could get a better chair.
customer_reviews.author: jtotman719

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, sturdy, seem durable.
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to assemble and so far have been holding up great. We've had them for 6 months now without any issues. These are stylish, sturdy, and seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lorunner

customer_reviews.title: Classic counter stools
customer_reviews.text: Got a pair of these stools. Assembly required, instructions could have been better, but at 75 years young I still figured it out! Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Rose G.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous stools, perfect height. Great quality. Match kitchen table I already had really nicely. Have had them for over a year and noticed some wobbling so I tightened screws and good as new! Would have given 5 stars but assembly on 2 out of 3 stools was tough. Screws didn’t line up perfectly and had to force one leg on. Nevertheless, very pleased with these stools!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these stools
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with how they were packaged and easy to assemble. They are comfortable, look really nice- quality
customer_reviews.author: shirley drake

customer_reviews.title: No complaints. Easy to clean and look nice.
customer_reviews.text: I did extensive research and searching on stools. I wanted a high quality stool but not at an exorbitant price. I am happy to say I found just that with these stools. They do look expensive, hold up well(only have had a little over a month) and they clean up nicely. I used to have fabric seats. This leather is so much eAsier to care for.
customer_reviews.author: Skbaby

customer_reviews.title: Quality at Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Great quality, easy to assemble, comfortable, matches other Boraam furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. K

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable swivel stool
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy and very comfortable. The swivel feature is nice.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pool

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful and heavy duty for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and heavy duty for the price. Our three kids and their friends are on them all of the time and we haven't had any problems even months after we bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Staying Alive

customer_reviews.title: Double check the hardware kit!
customer_reviews.text: Stools are sturdy and well made. Watch the screw lengths! I had 1 screw that was an inch longer than the rest and it started splitting the wood as i tried tightening it. I realized this before causing further damage and cut the screw down. Also, don't over tighten the screws or the split washers will deform and pop off. Use small metal washers under the nailed in leg protectors to level the stools.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: one is completely fine and good quality and the other one has parts ...
customer_reviews.text: i ordered two stools. one is completely fine and good quality and the other one has parts that keep coming loose including the bar where we rest our feet for support and to get up and down. the wooden bars that are connected to the legs keep coming loose and one of our family members fell and hit their head due to this malfunction. we keep screwing the bar keep the stool together.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this on October 3, 2018 and ended up dumping it in the trash on January 8, 2019. Bolts and caps to screw bolts in fell out after 2 weeks, repaired it three more times for the same issues before purchasing another stool. Real rating negative 5.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B.

customer_reviews.title: I have had these stools in my kitchen for two ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had these stools in my kitchen for two years now. Lots of use between the kids, friends and family. No cushion crush and seat swivels without issue. Most importantly there is no wobble. Most of the time with funiture that you have to put together you need to retighten over time. So far since i put these together I haven't had too.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Cotroneo

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed with that since I'm not sure how to fix
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these stools. The seat has 4 holes for screws and one of the holes is missing the threading to screw into. Really disappointed with that since I'm not sure how to fix. Other than that, the stools seem to be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: I like the style and finishing
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and finishing. But there are some design flaws. Seat metal piece will touch the top of legs and cause wood split because the weight! Like others had mentioned. Don't know how long it will last before it completely broke.
customer_reviews.author: LL Houston

customer_reviews.title: This chair is very sturdy and it looks great my only complaint is that ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very sturdy and it looks great my only complaint is that the cushioning on the seat could be a little better your butt will hurt after 30 minutes of sitting
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: they were easy to assemble and they look fantastic
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are EVERYTHING! I thought that they would be cheaply made, but they match the table that I bought them for so I decided to go for it. Was very pleasantly surprised to see the quality of this product. My husband was also surprised that he had to put them together. However, they were easy to assemble and they look fantastic! I'm glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryle L. Gainer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Issues
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these. One came broken ..... Took about 15 days to replace the part..... Woodwork looks good, however the vinyl seat cover looks cheap and appears flimsy. Update- replacement part delivered was wrong size. Update Dec 2014 - Downgraded the product rating to 1 star .... Amazon does not allow to give 0 :-( . The seat cover material is really flimsy and has come apart only after 6 months of use. Very bad quality. Amazon, you must black list this seller. Buy it if you only want to use it for 3 to 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Abhi

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on these stools. The wood is very nice, however, the actual black seat is the issue. A few days after I received them, there was a small rip in the seat. Didn’t think much of it until another one did the same! Thought these would last a lot longer than they did. Not happy at all. Guess they aren’t meant to be sat on!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M.

customer_reviews.title: A great little stool!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this item. It looks nice and the leather-like top swivels around which was a nice extra touch.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jones

customer_reviews.title: bar stools
customer_reviews.text: These stools were sized accordingly and fit just right under my island counter. Overall very satisfied with the stools only Was a little disappointed in the cherry color.. I was hoping they were a little darker cherry as shown in the pictures. They looked more like maple however, the contrast looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: M Boduch

customer_reviews.title: As good as it could be
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, very high quality, sturdy, and good looking. Way better than I hoped for. Try them!
customer_reviews.author: Charles C. Harner

customer_reviews.title: Nice stool, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this stool. It is great looking, very sturdy, and the shape of the seat is extremely comfortable. I like that it doesn't have a back, so does't impact the view into our kitchen. I bought 4 and had some challenges assembling one, which stripped the threads during assembly. Stores 123 sent replacement parts to resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: They look great with no defects. Easy to assemble. Swivel is a little tight in my opinion but maybe will loosen-up with use.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Jones

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good chair, but noticed the upper padded area "dips" ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good chair, but noticed the upper padded area "dips" to one side with a person of any kind of weight (more than 100 lbs)sitting on it. The chair seems to rotate without any difficulty or noise, and the legs seem to be strong enough without "wobbling ".
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to assempble
customer_reviews.text: These were very easy to assemble and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased four of these stools and we love them! They fit perfectly and are very comfortable! We are extremely happy with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Scott M. Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: swivel seat is very comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: Well built, heavy construction, swivel seat is very comfortable....wife loves them....all is good with the world ;)
customer_reviews.author: DrB

customer_reviews.title: Change in product deminsions.
customer_reviews.text: This product has changed since Oct. 2017 when I first ordered. Love them and order more. They sit the same height 24 in. But there are differences that are noticeable as seen in picture. The quality is not as good. Amazon is kind enough to help fix things.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppymom

customer_reviews.title: Cushions splitting after less than 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Boraam changed manufacturers from China to Vietnam. We bought 3 chairs, one from China, the other 2 were made in Vietnam. The difference in initial finish and quality was noticeable when we opened the box. One year later, the cushions on the Vietnamese made chairs are splitting at the seams, while the one made in China still looks great, Obviously Boraam moved to a ower cost supplier without caring about the drop in quality
customer_reviews.author: Philly_Guy

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 88year old mother, she loves it, uses it in the corner of the kitchen so she can chop her vegetables and swivel to cook as she has hip problems and can't stand long. Was not difficult to put together, quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: S.D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality furniture
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match for the ones I already had, good quality, easy assembly. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The wood cracked before I even got it together. Other reviewers commented about the wood, also.
customer_reviews.author: scaliwag

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like these stools. I bought two and found that they are solid, easy to put together, and went together without a problem. Unlike other reviewers, I like the fit of the seat. The swivel mechanism also works well. They fit in my midcentury modern kitchen and were really reasonably priced. There are some finish issues, hence the downgrade, but overall I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Square peg

customer_reviews.title: Excellant stools at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Chairs arrived earlier than anticipated. Put together easily and very pleased with quality and appearance. Had been looking for a long time for well made stools at a good price. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: bill tucson

customer_reviews.title: Not a full refund !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I returned these stools because they did not go in my home,the color was too dark.It cost me $55.00 to return them and if that wasn't bad enough,They refunded me $148.00 and I paid $181.45. I would not buy from this vendor ever again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money but...
customer_reviews.text: Ok stool but the material on the seat cover will not last. It will crack and start to peel after a few months. I bought 3 and they all did the same thing. Structurally they have held up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rob D

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Just about a month into use and the leather surrounding the rivets is starting to crack. Looking like these will be short lived/disposable furniture. Update at 2 months - "Leather" is now just floating on the top of the stool having separated from the rivets in about 80% of the surround. Inching closer to the recycle bin.......
customer_reviews.author: Brent H

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bar stools
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wooden stools! They are very good quality and we’re easy to assemble. I found them slightly too tall so I removed the plastic tabs on bottom of the legs and replaced with thinner felt pads. Great buy and have gotten lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a piano stool
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use with my keyboard! Works wonderful and looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Karen W. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, that's all I have to say.
customer_reviews.text: Wow these are nice. They not only look great they are very sturdy, very well built. They are a perfect color (shade) of cherry.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Leshick

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but 2 out of 4...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look, but 2 out of the 4 stools i bought have had problems coming apart. One just keeps coming unscrewed, another I had to glue and drill and add brass screws to hold together. I guess for the price they are good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Escobedo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chair
customer_reviews.text: These are Beautiful I absolutely love them. I bought two and now am going back to buy two more. They are heavy great quality about 35/40 lbs. Would highly recommend these to anyone. Hoping they come out with more colors. This Natural is true and matches my HW floors perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very solid and able to assemble alone even though 2 are recommended
customer_reviews.text: Well satisfied with this stool, very sturdy and heavy I am enjoying it
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH in Wisconsin

product_meta.title: Boraam Backless Bar Height Stool, 29-Inch, Cherry
product_meta.description: Color:Cherry| Size:29-Inch, 1-Pack| Style:BacklessIf you're looking for a backless stool, stop right now The Boraam Backless Stool is what you've been looking for Featuring a ball bearing steel three hundred and sixty degree swivel plate, solid hardwood and high density foam seat cushion. The Boraam Backless Stool adds style to your home with its meticulously carved seat apron, flared legs and handsome finish and single welt cord trimmed upholstery. Complete your home today with the Boraam Backless Stool Both counter and bar height available, both in three different wood finishes. Recommended for residential use only. Note: Seat height is measurement from floor to base of seat, and does not include additional height for seat cushion.
feature_bullets: Ready To Assemble construction (RTA): all tools are included making assembly easy as 1, 2, 3
Black leatherette upholstery with single welt cord trim
Double seat apron for added support
Flared legs and full-ring footrest add stability
Pairs well with Boraam's Augusta, Sumatra, Palmetto, Georgia, Kyoto and Cathedral
Warranty and support only available for products purchased directly from authorized retailers. See website for details
